snippet: Costco, the giant discount retailer, is returning to the art market after a six-year hiatus prompted by the sale of two disputed Picasso drawings online.
abstract: Costco resumes online sales of fine art after quitting the business in 2006 when questions were raised about the authenticity of two Picasso drawings it sold.
lead_paragraph: Costco, the giant discount retailer, is returning to the art market after a six-year hiatus prompted by the sale of two disputed Picasso drawings online.

headline.seo: Costco Returns to the Business of Selling Fine Art
headline.main: Shopping List: Tuna, Detergent, a Warhol
headline.print_headline: Shopping List: Tuna, Detergent, A Warhol
